nodes.text:
Darth Tenebrous was an ancient Sith Lord who was the Sith Master of Darth Plagueis.
Although  the Scimitar, Darth Maul's personal starship, was officially designed by Raith Sienar;  further studies highlighted the possibility that the ship had been designed by Darth Tenebrous.

Tenebrous was the namesake of the "Tenebrous Legion," the 26th Legion of the Sith troopers of Darth Sidious' Sith Eternal, a secret Sith cult. Because the history of the Sith was hidden from the rest of the galaxy, only Sith Eternal cultists were aware of the significance of the name.

Tenebrous was first mentioned in the new Star Wars canon in the Star Wars: The Rise of Skywalker: The Visual Dictionary, a 2019 reference book written by Pablo Hidalgo that accompanied the film Star Wars: Episode IX The Rise of Skywalker. The character was originally introduced in the Star Wars Legends continuity in "The Tenebrous Way," a short story in Star Wars Insider 130 written by Matthew Stover and illustrated by Brian Rood.
